class.name: OpenXRSpatialCapabilityConfigurationBaseHeader
class.brief_description: Wrapper base class for OpenXR Spatial Capability Configuration headers.
class.description: Wrapper base class for OpenXR Spatial Capability Configuration headers. This class needs to be implemented for each capability configuration structure usable within OpenXR's spatial entities system.

method.name: _get_configuration
method.description: Return a pointer (encoded as an [code]int64_t[/code]) to a struct holding the spatial capability configuration data. The memory for this struct should remain accessible as long as this object remains instantiated.

method.name: _has_valid_configuration
method.description: Return [code]true[/code] if this object contains a valid configuration that can be retrieved when calling [method _get_configuration].

method.name: has_valid_configuration
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this object contains a valid configuration that can be used when calling [method OpenXRSpatialEntityExtension.create_spatial_context].
